title: Simple, Honest Pricing
subtitle: Try free. Upgrade for unlimited clips, offline mode, and more.

betaNotice.title: This is beta software.
betaNotice.description: Clipboard capture works great. Desktop app and offline sync coming soon.

locked.question: Is beta pricing really locked in forever?
locked.answer: Yes. Like YouTube Premium early adopters who still pay $7.99 while new users pay $13.99 (10 years later), your $2.99/mo rate never changes. Ever.

why.question: Why pay when the official clipper is free?
why.answer: If the official clipper works for you, stick with it. We built this for people who experience "go online" errors and need offline support. Different problem, different solution.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. No questions asked, no hidden fees.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards via Stripe. Your payment information is secure and encrypted.
